description: This file defines a REST controller for handling analysis and matching endpoints related to resumes and jobs in a web backend application. It includes endpoint mappings for analyzing resumes, matching resumes to jobs, listing matches, and retrieving specific match details. The class interacts with service and repository layers and uses annotations for API documentation and security.

classes.name: AnalysisController
classes.description: REST controller managing endpoints for resume analysis and matching operations.

methods.name: analyzeResume
methods.description: Endpoint to analyze a resume given its ID, returning an Analysis object wrapped in an ApiResponse.

methods.name: match
methods.description: Endpoint to perform matching between a resume and a job, creating and returning a Match object.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieve a list of matches for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieve a specific match by its ID for the authenticated user.

search-terms: APIs for resume and job matching
